English:
When landing a Critical hit, additionally heals a random ally for 50% of the damage dealt. 
Removed upon using a fixed skill.
Chinese:
暴击时额外给予随机友方角色伤害量50%的治疗。
使用固定能力后解除。

English:
Once per turn, when killing an enemy on the far left/right with a single-target attack skill, cast it again on adjacent enemies. Attacks triggered this way have a Critical rate capped at 54%. 
Removed upon using a fixed skill.
Chinese:
每回合一次，使用单体攻击技能击杀最左或最右侧敌人时，对相邻敌人再次释放，以此方法释放的攻击暴击率最高为54%。
使用固定技能后解除。

English:
When dealing damage with a single-target attack skill, deal an additional 30% of ATK as damage. 
Critical rate is capped at 70%, excess rate is converted into double Critical damage. Current Critical damage: 150+&a%. 
Removed upon using a fixed skill.
Chinese:
使用单体攻击技能造成伤害时，额外追加攻击力30%的伤害。
暴击率上限锁定为70%，超出部分会转化为2倍的暴击伤害。当前暴击伤害：150+&a%
使用固定技能后解除。

English:
All allies gain ATK+1/Healing+1/DEF+10% based on their class. 
Removed upon using a fixed skill.
Chinese:
所有友军根据其职业，获得攻击力+1/治疗力+1/防御力+10%的增益。
使用固定技能后解除。

English:
Up to 3 times per turn: When landing a Critical hit, add a "Basic Attack Magic" card with Swiftness, Exclude, and "Discard after 1 turn" to your hand, reducing its cost to 0. 
Removed upon using a fixed skill.
Chinese:
每回合限3次，每当自身暴击时，将一张附带迅速，放逐，一回合后弃牌的“一般攻击魔法”置入手牌，使其费用变为0。
使用固定技能后解除。

English:
Recast the first skill of each turn once. 
Removed and fully heals HP upon entering Death's Door.
Chinese:
每回合自身使用的第一个技能将重复释放一次。
进入濒死状态时解除并恢复所有生命值。

English:
While active, grants the weapon: "Sword of Light: Supernova". 
When equipped, adds "Beginning of All Miracles" to the deck at battle start. Transforms into other skills based on class buffs. 
Using this skill or its copies increases Critical rate by 10% and Critical damage by 10% for 3 turns, scaling up to 1.5x or 2x based on Sword of Light charge stacks.
Chinese:
激活此被动时获得武器：“光之剑：超新星”。
装备“光之剑：超新星”时，战斗开始时将一张“所有奇迹的开始”置入牌库。根据自身职业增益不同，此技能会转化为其他技能。
使用此技能或其衍生技能时，3回合内自身暴击率增加10%，暴击伤害增加10%，根据光之剑能量填充的层数效果增加至1.5或2倍。

English:
Tendou Alice, member of Millennium Science School's Game Development Club. 
A mysterious girl found in ruins, with all details including age unknown. Now a passionate gaming enthusiast alongside Momoi, Midori, and Yuzu. 

<color=#919191>"...I have been waiting for the moment that voice would call to me."</color>
Chinese:
天童爱丽丝，千年科学学园所属，游戏开发部的部员。
在废墟中被发现的谜之少女，包括年龄在内的情报完全未知。现今，成为了与桃井、绿以及柚子三人共同享受游戏的重度发烧友。

<color=#919191>"……我一直在等待，被那道声音呼唤的时刻"</color>

English: A righteous strike to vanquish evil...
Alice is here. Alice will assist.
Chinese: 爱丽丝在这里。爱丽丝会帮忙。

English: The light shall guide our path.
O brave one. May light be with you.
Chinese: 勇者啊。愿光明与你同在。
敌人确定歼灭。任务完成。
血量条已经开始变红了！

English: Today, Alice's role is single-target Light DPS!
Chinese: 今天爱丽丝的职责是，光属性单体输出！

English: Monsters aren't frightening. Dark attributes are always weak to Light.
Chinese: 怪物的存在一点也不可怕。因为暗属性一定被光属性克制。

English: What adventure awaits today? Alice is ready to journey.
Chinese: 今天要去什么样的冒险呢？爱丽丝准备好一起踏上旅程了。

English: Hmm. Energy low. Eh...? Alice doesn't consume batteries!
Chinese: 嗯。肚子饿了。诶…？爱丽丝，不吃电池的！

English: No humans have come here for millennia... Always wanted to say that line.
Chinese: 已经数千年没有人类来到这里了…。总想说这样的台词。

English:
Gains 1 charge stack (Critical Rate +10%) at turn end if not fully charged. 
Critical damage scales with Alice's level.
Chinese:
每回合结束时，若自身充能未满，则获得一层充能（暴击率+10%）。
暴击伤害随爱丽丝等级提高。

English: Generates random exclusive Alice skills (excluding class cards) with Exclude and "Discard after 2 turns".
Chinese: 随机生成爱丽丝的专属技能（不包括职业卡），并使其附带放逐，2回合后弃牌。

English:
Cannot be used. 
While in hand, grants 20% Critical Rate and 25% Critical Damage.
Chinese:
无法使用。
位于手中时，获得20%暴击率以及25%暴击伤害加成。

English: When class buff changes, draw this skill from deck or discard pile.
Chinese: 每当自身职业增益发生变化时，从牌库或弃牌堆抽取此技能。

English: Only usable with active class buff. Removes class buff and returns class card to hand after use.
Chinese: 自身有职业增益时才能使用。释放后，解除职业增益并将职业卡拿回手中。

English: While in hand, reduces this skill's countdown by 1 and increases Critical Rate by 20%/Accuracy by 10% whenever allies use skills.
Chinese: 位于手中时，每当其他友军使用技能，减少本技能1倒计时，并提升20%暴击率和10%命中率。

English: Recast three times, each hit's damage increases equal to the previous hit's damage.
Chinese: 重复释放共三次，每次的伤害都会根据前一次的伤害等量增加。

English:
Ignores DEF. 
Cost and multiplier scale with Alice's level. 
If killing target, recasts at half power on all enemies. Damage increases by 1.5x or 2x based on charge stacks. Consumes all charges.
Chinese:
无视防御。
费用和倍率随爱丽丝等级提升。
若击杀目标则以一半倍率对所有敌人再次释放，根据能量填充的层数，使其伤害量增加至1.5或2倍。发射后，消耗所有充能层数。
世界的 法则 即将崩坏！

English:
(Critical Rate increases with Alice's level) 
Critical hits deal 2x or 3x final damage based on charge stacks. Consumes all charges.
Chinese:
（暴击率根据爱丽丝的等级提升）
暴击时，根据能量填充的层数，使最终伤害变为2或3倍。发射后，消耗所有充能层数。

English:
Prioritizes drawing class skills. 
Transforms into corresponding skill when class buff is active.
Chinese:
优先抽取自身的职业技能。
持有职业增益时，变为对应技能。

English:
While in hand, reduces this skill's cost and countdown by 1 per Critical hit. 
After casting, deals damage equal to skill's value (boss HP cannot drop below 1).
Chinese:
位于手中时，每当自身暴击时减少此技能1点费用和倒计时。
释放后，根据此技能面板伤害，等量削减敌人生命值。（对boss敌人不会使其小于1）
光之剑：阿特拉哈西斯的超新星

English: Heals all other allies for &a HP (60% of Alice's ATK).
Chinese: 治疗所有其他友军&a点体力值，基于爱丽丝攻击力（60%）

English: Draw 2 skills. If boss or cursed enemies are present, draw 3 instead.
Chinese: 抽取2个技能。如果场上存在boss或诅咒敌人，改为抽取3个技能。

English: Draw "Beginning of All Miracles" from deck or discard pile.
Chinese: 从牌库或弃牌堆抽取“所有奇迹的开始”。

English:
When in fixed skill slot, gains corresponding class trait buffs. 
If this skill lacks Exclude: Casting from hand replaces current fixed skill instead of going to discard. 
Casting as fixed skill shuffles into discard pile.
Chinese:
此技能在固定技能位时会获得相应的职业特性增益。
如果此技能不带有放逐，则：
从手中释放时，不会进入弃牌堆而是替换当前固定技能。
作为固定技能释放后，洗入弃牌堆。
